summary: hey y’all! emily here. i’m doing some downsizing and i’m trying to get rid of some clothes i don’t wear anymore, so i’m looking...
body: hey y’all! emily here. i’m doing some downsizing and i’m trying to get rid of some clothes i don’t wear anymore, so i’m looking to sell my band shirts. all are in very good condition, no stains, and generally gently used. asking $10 per shirt (each was originally purchased for about $20-25). from left to right, sizes are: M, Women’s L, M, S, M. if you have any questions or are interested, please feel free to message me!

summary: I bought a comic called Man-Eater and literally in the first few pages I saw a very familiar looking drawing and thought........
body: I bought a comic called Man-Eater and literally in the first few pages I saw a very familiar looking drawing and thought….. are those……. these dorks from the first PINOF……. Can’t even try to enjoy a simple comic without dnp reminding me that they own my ass.

summary: Fanfic update!
body:
Fanfic update!

SO, I just finished my first fic (well my first fan fic in a few years) for a phanfiction exchange. As soon as the authors are revealed, I will repost the fic and link the ao3 here on my tumblr. I’m so excited for you all to read it! I hope you all like it (it’s kind of a long boy, i was planning on like 4,000 words and it ended up being over 10,000). also, i’ll be done with school this week (and then i’ll be doing school online for a semester) so i’ll be able to finish all my half-done fics and start some new ones.

in addition, thank you to all the wonderful humans in charge of the phanfiction exchange for being so patient with me. i had to turn it in late due to personal reasons (this months been hell so i was only at like 2,000 words last monday, it was due friday) and i wanted to thank them for being so kind :) if i find their tumblrs, i will do a more specific shoutout.

also, a huge thanks to the fabulous @amazingmitchell whose going to beta my fic last minute. @amazingmitchell is so willing to help and is totally saving my ass. big appreciate!

also, i’m going to be a lil proud of myself because, although i sucked the whole deadlines thing, i wrote about 10,000 words for my fic, about 3,000 words in a story for my creative writing course, and three poems, all in the span of a week. (also, the story for my creative writing course is due tomorrow and i have about 2,000 more words to go. big rippppp)

i hope you all are having a wonderful day!

summary:
Danny Howell
I was watching this video and noticed Dan saying he was taking two animals into conciltation for his fursona. The...
body:
Danny Howell

I was watching this video and noticed Dan saying he was taking two animals into conciltation for his fursona. The sloth bear and the Black Fox. So I decided to used my day off to sketch his Fox fursona. Pretty sure no one will see this but hear it is.
